CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISBLANK(Count_of_Closed_Won_Opps__c), ISBLANK(Count_of_Closed_Lost_Opps__c) ), 0, IF( (Count_of_Closed_Lost_Opps__c + Count_of_Closed_Won_Opps__c) = 0, 0, Count_of_Closed_Won_Opps__c / (Count_of_Closed_Lost_Opps__c + Count_of_Closed_Won_Opps__c) ) )
CustomField.label: Win Rate
